'''Nom the Wise''' is the seventeeth track of [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]].

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">Thus he died
Nom the Wise
Lord of the caves and friend of man
Fair, and noble
Most beloved of the Noldor race
Paid the price, he redeemed the oath
Farewell my friend, farewell
</poem>
[[Category:Songs by Blind Guardian]]
